channel.title: contribute on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in contribute on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update March 2024
item.description: The third Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, March 13th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! In the upcoming Live Update, we turn our attention to PrestaShop 9, a version yet to be released. We’ll explore the significant breaking changes introduced in this new version. @M0rgan01 will specifically address the backward incompatible changes due to the new Symfony Framework version, changes that are especially relevant for module developers using the Symfony Framework in their solutions.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - February 2024
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the second time in 2024. Read on for a recap of the session. PrestaShop Live Update - February 2024 The second live update in 2024 was held on February 7th, 2024. During the session, we had two presentations. Fabien Vallon, Lead Product Manager at PrestaShop, provided an exciting glimpse into the upcoming Core Upgrade application. This tool, set to be released later this year, promises to streamline the PrestaShop upgrade process, and we can’t wait to share more details with you.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update February 2024
item.description: The second Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, February 7th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! The upcoming Live Update in February 2024 will feature the presentation of two very interesting subjects! Fabien Vallon who is Lead Product Manager at PrestaShop will present an overview of the new Core Upgrade tool that is planned to be released this year. We will also have a special guest, Tomas Ilginis, a developer from Invertus, one of the leading agencies specializing in PrestaShop.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - January 2024
item.description: The project’s live update was held the first time in 2024 and streamed live on January 17th, 2024. PrestaShop Live Update - January 2024 The first Live Update in 2024 was a chance to show the community yet another presentation from PrestaShop Developer Conference, present new patch versions, and answer some questions about the project organization, branding, and the future. For those who are interested in slides from ≈Åukasz Janik’s presentation, he will write a blog post about it soon.

item.title: Announcing PrestaShop Project Live Update January 2024
item.description: The first Live Update for the PrestaShop Project in 2024 will happen on Wednesday, January 17th, 2024 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! In the first Live Update of the year, we have some news to share, and we will have a special guest. ≈Åukasz Janik from the e-commerce agency Waynet will join us to talk about CI/CD processes for PrestaShop, they use in their projects. This presentation was originally presented during the PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - December 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the tenth time this year and streamed live on December 20th, 2023. PrestaShop Live Update - December 2023 The first Live Update after a month-long break, due to the PrestaShop Developer Conference, was the occasion for an important announcement, which probably comes as no surprise now that you’re reading this blog. The project now has the same branding PrestaShop SA has been using for several months.

item.title: Announcing December PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The tenth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, December 20th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! This time, we will announce project updates and follow two presentations originally given at the PrestaShop Developer Conference in Paris: PrestaShop news - where we are and where we’re going by @matks API OAuth/CQRS in PrestaShop 9 by @jolelievre Join us on YouTube! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - October 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the ninth time this year and streamed live on October 11th, 2023. PrestaShop Live Update - October 2023 It was a special Live Update where we said goodbye to the project leader, Pablo Borowicz, who, after over six years, is leaving the PrestaShop company. On behalf of everyone in the project, I would like to thank him for all the work he has done for the project and wish him all the best in his future endeavors.

item.title: Announcing October PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The ninth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, October 11th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation and at the end of the session we will make a very special announcement. Join us on YouTube! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session.

item.title: Hacktoberfest 2023
item.description: The month of October is coming quickly! So be prepared for Hacktoberfest, a month-long celebration of open source software. Hacktoberfest 2023 The online event has been happening every October since 2013 and is sponsored by DigitalOcean. This year marks the 10th anniversary of the event, with changes to help ensure its sustainability for the next decade. You‚Äôll learn about these right below. How can you participate? Very simple: people are encouraged to create at least 4 pull requests for open source projects on GitHub.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - September 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the eighth time this year and streamed live on September 13th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 02:30 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:28 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1.1, 8.0.5 and 1.7.8.10 08:56 Demo: changes in the developer documentation by @thomasnares 43:00 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing September PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The eighth Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, September 13th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation, and more! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand. If you have questions related to the open source project, feel free to let us know in advance using this form.

item.title: PrestaShop Live Update - July 2023
item.description: The project’s live update was held for the seventh time this year and streamed live on July 19th, 2023. The session’s agenda was as follows: 00:00 Beginning of the session: the introduction 01:51 Project news: PrestaShop Developer Conference 04:37 Project news: PrestaShop 8.1 14:39 Demo: enable WebP or Avif in PrestaShop 8.1 20:21 Demo: enable developer mode with cookie in PrestaShop 9.0 24:14 Demo: RectorPHP in PrestaShop 9.0 29:06 Demo: changes in the developer documentation 38:52 Q&A session You can use the timestamps to jump directly to the parts you want to watch.

item.title: Announcing July PrestaShop Project Live Update
item.description: The seventh Live Update for the PrestaShop Project will happen on Wednesday, July 19th, 2023 at 4 pm (Paris time) on YouTube! We will go over the latest project updates, take a look at recent changes in the software, changes made in the developer documentation, and more! Remember that at the end of every meeting, there is a Q&A session. You can ask your questions during the presentation or beforehand. If you have questions related to the open source project, feel free to let us know in advance using this form.

item.title: Freelance Developer and Translator: Meet SNor42
item.description: Have you ever wondered who‚Äôs hiding behind a Crowdin username? It‚Äôs time to find out! Contributor interviews are a great way of getting to know the people who participate in the PrestaShop project. For the second interview of 2023, we interview Norbert, aka SNor42. Ranked 29th on the top translator page, Norbert is a translator and proofreader on the Hungarian project. Hello SNor! :-) üëã Can you tell me more about yourself?
